item.def:
- 9 am: Mo’olelo Tour – Main Lobby. Complimentary.

- 11 am: Water Aerobics – Kona Pool – Get wet, have fun and get fit! Join our certified instructors for a great water workout set to upbeat music. $5.00 per person.

- 4 pm: Water Aerobics – Kona Pool – Get wet, have fun and get fit! Join our certified instructors for a great water workout set to upbeat music. Complimentary.

- 5 pm: Pu (Conch) Blowing Lessons  Ocean View Terrace. Complimentary.
item.name: Mondays

item.def:
- 9 am: Kai ola Tour (Marine Life) – Bottom of the Grand Staircase. Complimentary.

- 11 am: Water Aerobics – Kona Pool – Get wet, have fun and get fit! Join our certified instructors for a great water workout set to upbeat music. $5.00 per person.

- 5 pm: Pu (Conch) Blowing Lessons  Ocean View Terrace. Complimentary.

- 8-9 pm: Star Gazing – Kohala Tennis Count #1 – Star Gaze Hawaii offers a guided tour of the clear Hawaiian night sky. Cost: Adults $30, Childrent ages 5-11 $15, Childrent under 5 – free (All minors must be accompanied by a paid adult)
item.name: Tuesdays

item.def:
- 9 am: La’au Tour – Top of Kamehameha Court. Complimentary.

- 4 pm: Water Aerobics – Kona Pool – Get wet, have fun and get fit! Join our certified instructors for a great water workout set to upbeat music. Complimentary.

- 5 pm: Pu (Conch) Blowing Lessons  Ocean View Terrace. Complimentary.
item.name: Wednesdays

item.def:
- 8.30 am: Stand Up Paddle Board Introdution – Saltwater Lagoon – Get in on the hottest new water activity! $25 per person.

- 9 am: Kai ola Tour (Marine Life) – Bottom of the Grand Staircase. Complimentary.

- 10 am: Snorkeling Introduction – Kona Pool – Snorkling is easy when you learn from our experienced Ocean Sports staff in the sefety of shallow water. Bring your swimsuit, sunsreen and a smile! Complimentary.

- 11 am: Water Aerobics – Kona Pool – Get wet, have fun and get fit! Join our certified instructors for a great water workout set to upbeat music. $5.00 per person.

item.def:
- 9 am: Mo’olelo Tour – Main Lobby. Complimentary.

- 11 am: Water Aerobics – Kona Pool – Get wet, have fun and get fit! Join our certified instructors for a great water workout set to upbeat music. $5.00 per person.

- 5 pm: Pu (Conch) Blowing Lessons  Ocean View Terrace. Complimentary

item.def:
- 8.30 am: Stand Up Paddle Board Introdution – Saltwater Lagoon – Get in on the hottest new water activity! $25 per person.

- 9 am: La’au Tour – Top of Kamehameha Court. Complimentary.

- 5 pm: Pu (Conch) Blowing Lessons  Ocean View Terrace. Complimentary.
